title: Nick "Biggie" Grimaldi from Good Fight Management
itunes:title: Nick "Biggie" Grimaldi from Good Fight Management
description:
A long time friend is my guest this week in the form of Nick Grimaldi, or what many know him as "Biggie". He is a manager of most of your favorite bands like Between the Buried and Me, Every Time I Die, Circa Survive, Bless The Fall, Terror and MANY others. We dive deep into his introduction to working in the music industry as a merch slinger for Eighteen Visions and Throwdown and eventually Every Time I Die as well as his personal upbringing. It's a really deep conversation that I was happy to have and ultimately bring to you! -- -Follow the show on TwitterEmail the show: 100wordspodcast@gmail.com 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
